website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you need to buy a number of post lights, but be careful handling them.
pros: Available in bronze, black, and white finishes
Installs within a matter of minutes
Comes in one piece in the box, so no assembly required
cons: The glass is fragile and prone to breaking, so be careful while handling it

customer_reviews.title: beautiful light for a small Porch
customer_reviews.text: Updating 22 yr old home , beautiful light for a small Porch area
customer_reviews.author: nanaof14

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate to find this discounted on Amazon via the used section. It was a great replacement for my ugly, broken fixture. Easy to install and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one with the three smaller lights
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as big as the price lets on. cheap and with a normal lightbulb in it, THAT"S ALL YOU SEE when you're looking in that direction. The glass doesn't obscure the fact that there's a bulb in there. Would not buy again.. recommend you get the ones with the three smaller looking bulbs (the little sockets) because that has a twinkle and high-end look to it. I'll be tossing this one in the trash once i get around to finding a better one. easy to install, gets the job done.. but man o man...
customer_reviews.author: A handy guy

customer_reviews.title: Great lovely design solid build
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, real thick glass, great all around. However, there is no bottom to the light, its a open design. So good for air flow to keep the build cool( if halogen) but using a LED no issus. This design allows bugs to fly up under to the light easy but shouldn't be to bad , bugs would and fall to the ground hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: David M.D

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this light. Great quality, low price. I replaced a flush mount that was positioned over 17 ft in the air and very hard to change bulbs on This is now hanging about 2 feet above my door frame. With the open bottom, it’ll be very simple to change bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Roger

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material and break easily
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap lamps. Very thin glass. Very Very thin metal. I purchased 9 of them to install on my driveway posts. One was broken when it arrived. 1 broke during installation. 1 I found broke 1 week after install. So out of 9, 3 were useless in the first week of use. I realize these weren't high dollar units, but I would expect them to last more than a week of use. I am returning them all. Amazon has been great because I made the decision to return them within the 30 day window. Now looking for other options.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hanging lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great hanging lights. Easy to install and well made. I'm going for a particular theme in my 110+ year old house so these were installed in the kitchen. Once installed, I was eager for night to arrive so I could see how they looked. Very pleased with the amount of light they provide. I'm using warm white LED bulbs in them. I will be buying more of these when I re-do other rooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light, poor hardware selection.
customer_reviews.text: This light light is awesome for cost, However a few drawbacks are the mounting screws and hardware. This only comes with one length of bolt, but two different screw heads. ( Flathead &philips ) As you adjust the bolts to mount the light fixture the hardware bracket bends making it very very difficult to line the bolts up with the holes. Another drawback it the small bolts that hold both the top of the light on and the light to the wall. The nuts come lose from the bolt as it's two piece construction..this makes it easy to lose while install/ changing bulbs. I'd recommend glueing the nuts to the bolts heads.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality lamp post head
customer_reviews.text: My old lamp post head socket became corroded to the point of needing replacing. This is a very reasonable alternative, and attractive. Two things to be aware of: It's not that big, and it is open on the bottom. An open bottom with a light fixture attracts bugs, which can lead to problems.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful On Brick post.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to install for a homeowner. Installed on top of brick post . Bought a different mounting base from same company on Amazon for flat mounting. Installed fire flickering bulbs. Build quality and packaging is excellent, I’m thinking these should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Higgins

customer_reviews.title: wrong instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a hanging lamp. The instructions were for a wall lamp. Additionally the wires are not black and white both are brown. There is a very very small ridge on one of the brown wires. That is suppose to indicate neutral or white. I installed it and it looks as expected and works. However if you are going to install this yourself and have never installed a hanging lamp before and you get the wrong instructions as I did, it could be a real challenge to install
customer_reviews.author: Bill Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Looked fine, somewhat tougher install than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wall mounted light. It looks fine once mounted, but I did have some difficulty with the install. The crews that go into the mounting bracket and stick through the unit base were way too long, and as they're covered by small/shallow nut cups - they couldn't cover the depth of the screw sticking out. Backing the screw out on the inside left it rather wobbly, so I picked up some shorter screws that stuck out to a depth that the nut-cups could handle. Also, I ordered 3, but of course one arrived with 2 broken panels - thankfully Amazons return/replace policy worked just fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia O.

customer_reviews.title: Lamp Is reasonably priced and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to replace the broken lantern on my walk lamp. The pole was white and, therefore, I wanted another white lantern. None of the DIY stores in the area currently had white in stock so I ordered this lantern thru Amazon. It looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: keytracke

customer_reviews.title: Wall Sconce light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a match for the porch light I installed. Weather has been bad and I haven't had a chance to install. But found the glass on a side panel was cracked and a small piece missing. I'm going to use and not return as I'm not sure I can find another that will match as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Burnett

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and it looks that. Decided to keep because it's outside. Wish I'd spent a little more though. They dont look like they will hold up. Also, one had been opened and was missing the bag of parts, delaying the installation...shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, especially for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, about what you’d expect for under $40. It is real metal and glass, but very thin and insubstantial. I actually cracked the base when tightening the screws down because the bottom rim is so weak, but it’s not super noticeable. I still expect this to do fine for my purposes, just don’t expect it to last 100 years or something.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Good price, easy to install. Fit on the preexisting mounts from my stone wall. Great value, purchased four and don't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: Installing it in the gazebo for extra lighting. Haven’t done it yet, but happy with the look and quality of it. Delivered promptly considering the delays I’ve been having due to the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: ARB

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but missing nut, washer
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive outdoor wall light, but like so many DIY items you buy, parts are missing. In this case, it’s just a $.10 white nut and washer, but it’s the sort of thing that can drive you mad. It’s not worth it to repack and send it back, so I will install it with nuts I have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: The old lamp post was a wreck. This one looks so nice and adds something to the curb appeal of the house, plus I quite like the extra light to see by as I go into the house at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Broke with in 3 week of install.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was easy. It looked great but yesterday it broken from the base and is literally hanging on cables. My return window closed 2/13 so out of luck. Crappy product did not last 3 weeks after install. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light. The price cannot be beat. The glass is pretty fragile, as noted in the other reviews, and I had one (out of the 4 I purchased) crack. Not a problem, I just made sure the cracked pane was in the back. Still a great lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to put in and you can make it as long as needed. The style I enjoy & matches alot. When turned on looks even better would buy again and recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Missing out of the white finish nuts, otherwise a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is made of metal. I thought it would be plastic. So it's a good bang for the big. Very easy to install. I add clear caulk around it to make a water tight seal against my hardy plank siding. The only negative was the missing white finishing nut. I found a similar one at Lowes that did the job.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Good price, bad finish.
customer_reviews.text: Look it's a good price for a mounted light and it works just fine. The reason for the less stars is the finish on it..very spotty bad paint job.. Its about impossible to tell from the ground so, I am not going to return it. But quality in that department is lacking. I actually painted some of it to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Zulkeski

customer_reviews.title: Good value light.
customer_reviews.text: Looks a little "plasticky", but since it's made of plastic that's to be expected. Not a high-quality item, but good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a light that goes on a standard post. So.... It lights.... It fits on a standard post.... And it's black
customer_reviews.author: Smart Azz

customer_reviews.title: Okay, check for damage right away
customer_reviews.text: One of the glass panes was cracked but not visible to the outside. Didn't want to go through the hazzle of returning - wanted the lamp on the post sooner. For the price, it is okay, but looks small on a six-seven foot lamp post.
customer_reviews.author: Ash2000

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A great deal. Looks better than the one that some goofball broke. The only downside is that I had to repaint my poll, the new fixure made the poll look pretty dingy. Almost looks new from the ground up.
customer_reviews.author: DragonBreath

customer_reviews.title: Service is the worst.
customer_reviews.text: Ike work for 6 months then quit working. Found trouble a minor thing but the company will not reply to my questions. Would not recommend this item or manufacturer to anyone. The supplier was definitely not helpful at all. The manufacturer has no phone number to contact them. They were from out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F

customer_reviews.title: The  promptness and the product was exactly as  advertise
customer_reviews.text: I liked very much they easy to install and matched our outside lighting perfectly ! We were happy wih Prompt delivery and just as they said it would be looked exactly like what we saw on your picture thanks again the one thing I would like to ask is how can I order some glass for those one of mine broke the side glass one of them broke I need a new one
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great style
customer_reviews.text: Love the overall look of these, but wish they would have had a size larger for the columns we have to mount them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi E

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller then I had anticipated, Used them in the backyard and ordered larger ones for the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: todd wild

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Packaged beautifully. Very attractive light. Tremendous value for the money. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: boater

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Hope the insects stay out of the bottom, but should be easy to blow out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light !!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this light. Made of metal, very sturdy, good size overall. The rippled glass gives it an elegant look for a minimal price. Was easy to install as a replacement light, just hooked up new bracket and wires. I didn't have much space at top of electrical box, so this hanging down light was just the ticket. Would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price these are pretty good. Don't expect high quality thought they are metal. I ordered 2 and one came with a large crack in the glass. I didn't notice it until it was too late. Still after ~ 1 month of usage they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Huerta

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: our original lantern stopped working, we got this. easy install , and looks good. we have light again! would recommend , we have a rental home, so no need to spend an arm and a leg,
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light. Classy look.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install. Had to retrofit an old existing light pole with a PVC reducer and this light fit perfectly. Very classy and elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp light. Was very easy to install. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SLAP

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor light!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this light. It's the perfect price for what & where I wanted it. It came with a long chain that allows you to hang it at any height.
customer_reviews.author: M. Campi

customer_reviews.title: Great for those that aren't good with tools.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to replace the broken lamp topper with this one in no time at all. Looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Tom Litzinger

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and it was easy enough to set up. Only dislike is the part they called "texture." It just seems to be glossy black paint splattered over the flat black coating. Would have looked better without the added texture.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Baudendistel

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting
customer_reviews.text: Just a little smaller than I thought it would be but very nice
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Real glass
customer_reviews.text: Kinda small.... but it works great for what I Needed
customer_reviews.author: Allen Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in one piece
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in one piece with no broken panes. Glass is a little loose in the frame, but clear caulking can remedy that. Easy to install. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leo D.

customer_reviews.title: Bright light well worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s great going to a single bulb I used to have a four light which was a pain to change.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality heavy metal light and bright
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality heavy metal light and bright! Had to send the first one back, the glass was busted. Amazon Prime was very quick to reimburse me and send me a new one lickity split. Awesome company!!! The light was easy to install and looks really nice, not cheap and plastic like the one I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: William J Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Glass looks great, open bottom means no bug corpses in the fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass in this fixture. Looks great. Also love that it's open on the bottom, so the little bug corpses don't get stuck in the bottom of the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Love the light
customer_reviews.text: I liked the light but ups tried to put the square box in a round hole. The glass in light didn't make it. Ordered another amazon made it good as always.
customer_reviews.author: Randy blalock

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It’s on the dainty side but nice. I like the textured glass and the design.
customer_reviews.author: Kangaroo

customer_reviews.title: very stlish
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and looks great. I think the quality is very good as well. Lights are brite and illuminate the yard well.
customer_reviews.author: steven chalenor

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate color description
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's an okay product, but we've never installed or used it. The color was not oil rubbed bronze, as it had more of a reddish tone. By the time I went to return it, we were prevented from doing so due to an expiration date on the return.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bundgaard

customer_reviews.title: but it seems adequate and looks like the pictures shown
customer_reviews.text: The lamp for the lawn light post was installed in a matter of minutes by my nephew. It seemed lighter in weight than I thought it would, but it seems adequate and looks like the pictures shown. It arrived more quickly than I had expected and all was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Toel

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 fixture Ordered bronze Boxes said bronze But delivered one bronze And one black Tried to go on and execute a return swap but it does not seem to work So who do I contact now
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Light is nice I bought 2 for my front porch. One big problem is the installation instructions are for a post lamp. This is a hanging light from a ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: D Carrico

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and look Easy to install Very nice product
customer_reviews.author: cherylann cook

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light with brown antiquey finish
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light with brown antiquey finish. Can be mounted high or with alot of chain drop like i did. Kind of a frank loyd wright meets craftsman style. Works great on my kind of cottagey porch.
customer_reviews.author: l dubya

customer_reviews.title: Simply Classy!
customer_reviews.text: The light is gorgeous and looks so elegant on my verandah/patio. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stargirl

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: Two out of three lights broke before or during shipment
customer_reviews.author: Greg Slater

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectations and as some of the other reviews that I read I had no problem what so ever in assembling and putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: DON S

customer_reviews.title: Pakaging is weak
customer_reviews.text: Great post light. This is a well constructed lamp. The issue i had is packaging. I ordered 15 and 6 came with shattered glass. They were replaced without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Caliente

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: The wires and chains seem excessively long but the light overall is very nice. Easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Finish is good. Connection nuts for top are very small and the connection could use speed nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Voraciousreader

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, appears to be of good quality. It's a little smaller than I expected, but I should have just read the dimensions more carefully. Looks great on our front entry!
customer_reviews.author: A. THOTTAM

customer_reviews.title: Don't aggravate yourself
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One looked fine - other glass broken. Returned one with broken glass. New replacement arrived and quality not at all the same as first one in that glass not secured as hinges appear to be a different brand/quality and wobbly glass then cracked. They "looked" good but, unfortunately not consistent quality and not worth returning, aggravating and low quality. At least when purchasing two of an item they should be the same. These were not.
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than i expected. I am still not positive about keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: A nice fixture for a modest price
customer_reviews.text: A nice fixture for a modest price. I was surprised to see that the bottom of the fixture is open to the elements but this may be necessary as some LED bulbs are not meant to operate in a fully enclosed fixture. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa,NY

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I just like that is so ridiculous ridiculously small for a Lamppost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small light
customer_reviews.text: Light was smaller than I thought and it's very small for a post light in my opinion. It seemed a but flimsy too but it's what you'd expect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MD 2020

customer_reviews.title: Reddish Copper Tone.
customer_reviews.text: Good light, my only gripe would be the color is hard to match as it has more of a reddish copper tone.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ercoline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: As advertised looks great, works great, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It looks very nice on my patio
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice on my patio. I bought 2 of these for my patio. They give out adequate light. Looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new porch light! LED bulb added, bright & won't attract bugs. Just the face lift needed for our home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look really good on the fence posts. Am glad we chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Tull

customer_reviews.title: I went ahead and ordered them anyway because I liked the look and the price
customer_reviews.text: I had read some of the reviews before I purchased these about the glass panes arriving broken or the screws being too short. I went ahead and ordered them anyway because I liked the look and the price. Mine arrived with no broken glass panes and the screws fit just right. They are really pretty and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: was too small had to return but no issues returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E, Mix

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace our rusted outdoor lamp post light; it looks great and is similar to the othe.er outdoor lights we have.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but a little over priced for the size
customer_reviews.author: Bunny La Baer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I expected but works good and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lightning though its a little too small for my outdoor entry way. The color is a lovely bronze.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty light. Have not set it up in the yard yet.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice looking, however, not has tall I I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Just too small for our pillars so we had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just too small for our pillars so we had to send back. Quality fit the low price of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great looking post light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up. Also the bottom end is open so bugs don’t get trapped.in the light. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Knight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well-made hanging pendant lights
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace our outdoor pendant lights, and these were a breeze to install. No assembly required other than cutting the chain and wires to length and installing. They are well made and beautiful! Product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: This is one sweet light. Easy to install, fast shipping and a good price
customer_reviews.author: W. Frank Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great looking light
customer_reviews.text: great looking light. easy to install and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: central fl user

customer_reviews.title: ... lights were cheaper to comparable one and they are beautiful I am so happy I got them
customer_reviews.text: These lights were cheaper to comparable one and they are beautiful I am so happy I got them
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Small light
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little small and looks slightly out of proportion to the post we installed it on. But it is pretty with a good level of brightness
customer_reviews.author: james wenson

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: I love my two new lights and so do the neighbors. I’m getting the matching lanterns for my garage
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Damaged at arrival
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging from the manufacturer. One pane of the glass was broken. Could hear it rattle before opening
customer_reviews.author: Randy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty..
customer_reviews.text: it is so pretty! It replaced a very old light post light, so it's a 100 percent improvement. Looks just lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice porch lamp.
customer_reviews.text: LIght installed easily and looks good on the porch. It is a little smaller than we wanted, but still adds a nice touch to the area.
customer_reviews.author: unapersona

customer_reviews.title: metal base is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The metal base is flimsy, so don’t screw it too tight. Mine cracked when I screwed it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sosan Azmeh

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations, but not amazed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but a little dim, either from the cold or from lack of charge time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for. Cheap metal and glass but surprisingly held up through Chicago winter.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Churchill

customer_reviews.title: ... a little smaller than I expected but it was easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: The light is a little smaller than I expected but it was easy to install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price. Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described. Took me 10 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Warren J. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This light is very nice work very well nicer than the picture thank you
customer_reviews.author: lost highway one

product_meta.title: Nuvo Lighting 60/4928 Banyon One Light Post Lantern 100 Watt A19 Max. Clear Water Glass Rustic Bronze Outdoor Fixture
product_meta.description: Color:Bronze/Dark| Style:Post LanternNuvo Lighting is uniquely, poised to become one of the industry’s leaders. With the sales and distribution resources of Satco products and the continued offering of finely conceived, well crafted products that deliver style, value and quality – Nuvo is a name that will become synonymous with lighting.
feature_bullets: Requires (1) 100W A19 max./Medium base (not included). The product is of transitional style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars505 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
